about_the_game:
Join us in celebrating twenty five years of GameMaker with GameMaker 25th Anniversary!

Manage your development house, keep your employees happy and squash bugs as they come up in this minigame filled, top down management and strategy game! Starting from a single programmer, you'll select features to develop for your game engine, buy new furniture for the office to improve the performance of your team, hire new developers, and collect posters for the office!

  • Select upgrades for your office to improve worker movement speed, productivity and more.

  • Pick cool features to add to your engine from a list  and develop them!

  • Keep your workers happy by clicking thought bubbles to send them through the office.

  • Repair broken objects by playing over a dozen minigames.

  • Click-and-squash bugs as they come up.

  • Release new engine features, gain popularity and collect posters based on the history of GameMaker!
detailed_description:
Join us in celebrating twenty five years of GameMaker with GameMaker 25th Anniversary!

Manage your development house, keep your employees happy and squash bugs as they come up in this minigame filled, top down management and strategy game! Starting from a single programmer, you'll select features to develop for your game engine, buy new furniture for the office to improve the performance of your team, hire new developers, and collect posters for the office!

  • Select upgrades for your office to improve worker movement speed, productivity and more.

  • Pick cool features to add to your engine from a list  and develop them!

  • Keep your workers happy by clicking thought bubbles to send them through the office.

  • Repair broken objects by playing over a dozen minigames.

  • Click-and-squash bugs as they come up.

  • Release new engine features, gain popularity and collect posters based on the history of GameMaker!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.8
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discreet video card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.9
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core 2.0
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 and higher, ATI Radeon HD-Series 4650 and higher, Nvidia GeForce 2xx-Series and up.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

name: GameMaker 25th Anniversary

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11, DX12 capable
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Made with GameMaker
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Join us in celebrating twenty five years of GameMaker with GameMaker 25th Anniversary! A fun look at the process behind creating the world's greatest 2D Game Engine! Manage your development house, keep your employees happy, and squash bugs as they come up!
